Name: Ghost Mountain Roller Coaster
About the game: Take a minecart ride in a haunted gold mine under the infamous Ghost Mountain . What awaits you inside is magic, mystery, death... and redemption! Ghost Mountain is an epic 12 minutes long roller coaster ride in a dark underground mine, filled with dreamlike scenery and magical, abstract landscapes, with fast and slow sections, indoor and outdoor areas and many surprises.
